__e: What is your opinion of the younger man, Hastings?
Hey, uh, look, I'm- - I'm sorry if I said something I wasn't supposed to. No.
No, please. I mean, tell me if I said something wrong.
If you did something wrong, then you apologize.
Look, I don't know what you're trying to do here, but I've done nothing wrong.
And I think, if I get this right... we haven't done anything wrong, and we're in the clear.
Why isn't that the first thing you think of... Foul play, that... that maybe he's been hurt?
No, in order to be a team, We need to focus our duplicity on others.
No. Can't you see that this is a frame-up?
I don't know what you heard about me, but you've been misled.
You know, all my friends... think that things are different between us than they are.
I don't know how, but you got the wrong idea about me.
You know, all my friends... think that things are different between us than they are.

I don't know how, but you got the wrong idea about me.
